name: Steven2PM's Maze 1 (First Game)
description:
Welcome To My First Game On Unity! By A Youtuber Speaks French. I Mean Me!

This Game Is Available To Mac

Your John A.K.A The Blue Book Stealer And Your Gonna Enter In A Blue Maze! So Collect All 10 Blue Books And Escape The Maze To Win! Warning Hard Game! Theres Also A Secret Ending In This Game! And It's A Creepyface Fangame! Also The Quit Button Does'nt Work...

GOOD LUCK!

Ps: You Have To Click In The System Preference (Security And Confidenciality) Open The File And You Can Play The Game
